TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract PointLightBase extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Light

Docs.summary: Abstract base class that represents a light object that has a position in space and projects its light in all directions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The rate at which the light's intensity diminishes over distance is determined by its range and attenuation properties.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
